cta1.title: Internxt Antivirus
cta1.subtitle: Secure your files from malware for the ultimate protection online

faq.question: What does antivirus software do?
answer: Antivirus software protects your files and device from corruption by monitoring and scanning files for known malware signatures. Once harmful software is detected and identified by an antivirus scan, the threat is removed, and your files remain secure and protected.

faq.question: Do I need an antivirus?
answer: Without antivirus protection, your device is vulnerable to privacy and security attacks. It is also at a higher risk of being infected, data loss, privacy breaches, and system damage.
As Internxt Antivirus is included in your subscription, you can benefit from private cloud storage and complete device and file protection.

faq.question: What devices support Internxt antivirus?
answer: Internxt antivirus includes Microsoft antivirus, antivirus for Mac, and Linux with a premium subscription through the Internxt Drive desktop app.

faq.question: Can I get Internxt antivirus on its own?
answer: No, Internxt Antivirus is part of our paid subscription plans and cannot be purchased separately. With a monthly subscription of $10,99 you can get private cloud storage, antivirus, VPN and much more.

faq.question: What is the difference between malware and a virus?
answer: Malware is the broader term for software designed to harm, exploit, or gain access to a network or device without authorization. It includes viruses and extends to other harmful programs like ransomware, spyware, worms, and trojans.

A virus is a specific kind of malware that attaches itself to your files and spreads to other systems when opened or run. Performing a regular antivirus scan with Internxt will identify and eliminate these threats.

faq.question: What is the best antivirus software?
answer: The best antivirus software depends on your specific needs and preferences, so it is always recommended to research your options and choose one that meets your needs, depending on your budget, device, and any additional features.
If you need antivirus for Mac, Windows, or Linux built into your cloud storage with a quick and easy system to scan and delete viruses from your device, try an Internxt plan.

ComponentsInColumn.title: Signs your device may be infected
ComponentsInColumn.description: Are you worried your device is infected with malware? Get Internxt Antivirus with a premium subscription for secure storage and file protection.

element1.title: Excessive battery drain
element1.description: If your battery runs out quicker than usual, it can be a sign that malware is running in the background, draining your power by using your device’s resources without your knowledge.

element2.title: Frequent system crashes or freezes
element2.description: Viruses can cause your system to crash due to malware that corrupts essential files or programs, causing instability, system crashes, or the device freezing unexpectedly.

element3.title: Unexplained pop-up ads or windows
element3.description: Unexplained pop-ups appearing when you’re not browsing could mean malware on your device, and you should run an antivirus scan to avoid further harm to your files.

element4.title: Devices overheating
element4.description: Similar to draining battery life, malware can force devices to steal performance while running high-intensity tasks in the background without you knowing, causing your device to overheat.

FeatureSection.title: Internxt Antivirus Scan. Detect. Protect.
FeatureSection.description: Keep your cloud protected and files safe from malware with cutting-edge antivirus protection. Available on Windows, Linux, and macOS desktop devices.

element1.title: Tailored security solutions for you
element1.description: Eliminate security threats instantly and customize your file security needs. Choose the files you want to perform an antivirus scan on or drop multiple files simultaneously.

element2.title: Ultimate protection
element2.description: We make defending against viruses quick and easy with advanced antivirus software that scans and removes malware to clean your files. Scan files whenever you want, optimize device performance, and protect yourself online.

element3.title: Security across all platforms
element3.description: Antivirus protection for Windows, Mac, and Linux integrated with your premium Drive subscription. We ensure your files are kept clean for peak device performance no matter where you store them.

FeatureSectionV2.title: What is antivirus software?
FeatureSectionV2.description: Antivirus software detects and removes malicious software (malware) from your device to prevent common cyber threats such as viruses, spyware, and ransomware. Internxt Antivirus is included in your premium subscription, letting you scan your files and keep your cloud secure.

element2.description: Full system or custom file scanning
